casebody.data:
Wednesday, October 18, 1995

MERIT DOCKET

94-2181. State ex rel. Linndale v. Teske.

In Mandamus. Sua sponte, cause dismissed because an action for declaratory judgment is here an adequate remedy at law.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur. Wright and Resnick, JJ., dissent and would grant the writ.
